org.encog.mathutil.randomize.generate

Class BasicGenerateRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.encog.mathutil.randomize.generate.AbstractGenerateRandom
      • org.encog.mathutil.randomize.generate.BasicGenerateRandom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenerateRandom

    public class BasicGenerateRandom
extends AbstractGenerateRandom
    A wrapper over Java's built in random number generator.
